project.name: C-C195A-SUBV-05-ST03-DT05-DF17-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C195A-SUBV-05-ST03-DT05-DF17-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Allocates a buffer of size 16 to copy taint source into. Checks that the the taint source length is less than 16, but if it is not, returns a -1. The -1 is silently converted to size_t, which is unsigned, resulting in a huge positive number. Then copies that many bytes into the buffer of size 16, causing a seg fault. Good inputs: taint source has length less than 16Bad inputs: taint source has greater than or equal to 16

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Good_Bye_World" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C195A-SUBV-05-ST03-DT05-DF17-CF03-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Allocates a buffer of size 16 to copy taint source into. Checks that the the taint source length is less than 16, but if it is not, returns a -1. The -1 is silently converted to size_t, which is unsigned, resulting in a huge positive number. Then copies that many bytes into the buffer of size 16, causing a seg fault. Good inputs: taint source has length less than 16Bad inputs: taint source has greater than or equal to 16

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="abcd" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
